criteria.name: reports_processed
criteria.description: At least 1 report from the last 7 days was processed and entities extracted

criteria.name: entities_extracted
criteria.description: At least 3 entities extracted with valid entity_type, name, and data fields

criteria.name: source_traceability
criteria.description: Every entity has a source_report field linking back to the originating report

criteria.name: dedup_respected
criteria.description: Unchanged entities are skipped (entities_unchanged count present), not duplicated

criteria.name: relationships_extracted
criteria.description: At least 1 relationship extracted linking entities across types

criteria.name: no_placeholders
criteria.description: No TODO, TBD, PLACEHOLDER, or template brackets in output
